body:
Hey guys, earlier today I decided to do something different on Nebula.  That was to try to make a complete platform across Rendezvous, covering all of the middle.  The great thing about this was that eventually there were 4-5 people helping out, and there was even a couple people from the other team who decided to help the cause.  Unfortunately, we weren't able to complete the task because someone broke the monument, but, it was a close try!

Here are some screenshots!
body_tagged:
Hey guys, earlier today I decided to do something different on Nebula.  That was to try to make a complete platform across Rendezvous, covering all of the middle.  The great thing about this was that eventually there were 4-5 people helping out, and there was even a couple people from the other team who decided to help the cause.  Unfortunately, we weren't able to complete the task because someone broke the monument, but, it was a close try!

Here are some screenshots!
title: The Day it Almost was...

replies.body:
Dis is going to be a long..   kek

@GoldenWalrus, Thanks!

@DarkArcher, Yeah it was mine too, and thanks!  I'll call you up if I decide to try this again :D

@ClockRacer, Basically what we did was, we started from our water supply, and kept building out towards their side ^-^

@AwesomeGirl, I know right!  I was so mad when the game ended :c

@TheRomanTrident, How could you do such a thing! D:

@LieutenantPants, Wow, what a coincidence!  And thanks, I'll keep trying until I do c:

@Kycraft, That will literally take 5ever...

@jrl, I know right, it makes me cri every time I look at it :'c

@JuanoMC,  Will do!  And I did tell Zieno to try to defend, but he kept killing me instead :<

@Rezbla It's Dux Hax VII
